BRDT3.SA.summary: Petrobras Distribuidora S.A. manufactures, processes, distributes, trades, transports, imports, and exports oil based products and other fuels in Brazil. It offers lubricants, compressed natural gas, biofuels, chemical products, sulfur, hydrocarbon solvents, asphalt, ethanol, Arla 32, convenience store products, and related services. The company also provides jet fuels, aviation gasoline, and aviation services; distributes green petroleum coke; undertakes projects for selling electricity; and operates a piped gas supply concession, as well as offers administrative and technical services. In addition, it engages in franchisees business; and power generation activities. The company serves aviation, retail, consumer, oil and gas, fine chemicals, agribusiness, coatings, adhesives, home care products, and rubber industries. It operates through a network of approximately 7,817 BR-branded service stations, as well as operates 1,215 BR Mania convenience stores, including 339 cafÃ©s, 210 bakeries, and 120 stores offering sandwiches and salads. The company was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. Petrobras Distribuidora S.A. is a subsidiary of PetrÃ³leo Brasileiro S.A. Â Petrobras.

CEAB3.SA.summary: C&A Modas S.A. operates a chain of retail fashion stores in Europe, Latin America, and Asia. The company's stores sell apparel, footwear, bags and accessories, mobile phones, watches, costume jewelry, cosmetics, and other products. It is also involved in the issuance of credit cards and personal loans; and intermediation in brokering and promoting the distribution of insurance, saving bonds, and related products offered by insurers and other third parties. The company operates 287 stores. It provides its products for female, male, and children, as well as sells online. The company was founded in 1841 and is based in Barueri, Brazil. C&A Modas S.A. is a subsidiary of Cofra Investments S.A.R.L.

CNTO3.SA.summary: Grupo SBF S.A. retails sports products under the Centauro brand in Latin America. It also offers products through its digital platform. As of September 30, 2020, the company operated 209 stores. Grupo SBF S.A. was founded in 2010 and is based in SÃ£o Paulo, Brazil.

LJQQ3.SA.summary: Lojas Quero-Quero S.A. operates as a home improvement retailer in Brazil. It offers furniture, appliances, and building materials. The company also provides credit card, extended warranties, and loans and financing services. Lojas Quero-Quero S.A. was founded in 1967 and is based in Cachoeirinha, Brazil.

MGLU3.SA.summary: Magazine Luiza S.A. engages in the retail sale of consumer goods. It operates through Retail, Financial Operations, Insurance Operations, and Other Services segments. The company sells technology products, appliances, electronics, telephony, furniture, gifts, and toys. It also grants credit and provides extended warranties for its products. In addition, the company is involved in the provision of consumer financing and consortium services for the purchase of vehicles, motorcycles, home appliances, and real estate properties; and e-commerce of perfumes, cosmetics, sports, and fashion products. Further, it provides integration, logistics, and technological solutions; and manages relation between merchants and marketplaces. As of December 31, 2019, the company owned 1,113 stores and 17 distribution centers. The company was founded in 1957 and is headquartered in Franca, Brazil. Magazine Luiza S.A. is a subsidiary of LTD AdministraÃ§Ã£o e ParticipaÃ§Ã£o S.A.

VVAR3.SA.summary: Via Varejo S.A., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the retail of consumer electronics, home appliances, telephony, and furniture in Brazil. As of December 31, 2019, it operated 1,070 stores under the Ponto Frio and Casas Bahia brand names, as well as 16 distribution centers and warehouses. It also offers products through e-commerce platforms, including pontofrio.com, casasbahia.com, and extra.com.br. The company was formerly known as Globex Utilidades SA and changed its name to Via Varejo S.A. in February 2012. Via Varejo S.A. is headquartered in SÃ£o Caetano do Sul, Brazil.
